title: WiBit.Net Video Tutorial - C++ Windows KeyLogger
description:
/* ************************************************************************** */
/* ************************ WiBit.Net Video Tutorial ************************ */
/* ************************************************************************** */
Title          : How to Make a KeyStroke Logger for Windows in C++
Num Videos     : 5
Lesson Length  : 29 minutes 3 seconds
Resolution     : 800 x 600
Codec Download : http://www.techsmith.com/download/codecs.asp
Date Recorded  : 7/14/2006
Narrator(s)    : Kevin Willett
OS:            : Microsoft Windows XP
Software       : Dev C++
Description    : This video tutorial was inspired by a project by myself (Kevin)
                 and Ryan Chite in an Operating System Security class. The 
                 object of the project was to create a piece of malicious 
                 software and deploy it on a computer. The project exploited 
                 the then soon-to-be release Windows Vista, in which Ryan and 
                 I used a Windows boot CD to place the key logger on the 
                 computer without any authentication. Thanks to the Microsoft 
                 Alliance we were able to get an advanced copy of Vista and 
                 find security exploits before most people were able too :-). 
                 After the project was complete, I created a video to give to 
                 students who were interested in computer security software. 
                 Each video features a disclaimer at the beginning. Please 
                 agree to the text before viewing the tutorials.
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-= Video List -=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
Video 1        : Developing The Skeleton
Video 2        : Intercepting The Key Strokes
Video 3        : Saving The Keystrokes
Video 4        : Dealing With a Few Exceptions
Video 5        : Adding Stealth
/* ************************************************************************** */
/* ***************************** About WiBit.Net **************************** */
/* ************************************************************************** */
WiBit was a website used by college students (and one professor) from Towson 
University in Baltimore, Maryland as a repository for learning materials. The
site creators were former Computer Science and Computer Security students, 
Kevin Willett and Bryan Stouffer. The first WiBit Tutorials were created by 
Kevin as a study aid for himself in late 2003. Over the following years Kevin
and Bryan decided to create a few tutorials and give themselves and their
fellow students a place to view and use them. Some were used as presentation
aids and students teaching students seminars. Over 30 tutorials were created!
The WiBit Tutorials served themselves well! All the students involved in the
project became professionals in their field of study. The creators Kevin and 
Bryan currently develop medical software. Others are working for great 
companies such as Bowing and Lockheed Martin. Since college the need to 
create tutorials has died down, but who knows what the future holds!
